author: cbs8
title: Attend Clark Atlanta University Homecoming and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85
text:
Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 offers convenient lodging for Clark Atlanta University Homecoming on October 24, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 16, The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport hotel North I-85 offers convenient lodging to alumni and families attending Clark Atlanta University Homecoming. Clark Atlanta will play Albany State in the Homecoming game at 2pm on October 24. Additional festivities will include a parade, tailgate parties, and a golf tournament.
"We are pleased to welcome guests attending Homecoming at Clark Atlanta University," comments Vincent Thomas, the new General Manager of the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85. "Our award winning property is just minutes from campus," explains Thomas.
This non-smoking ATL Airport hotel features 105 well appointed rooms with microwave, refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Some rooms are equipped with whirlpool tubs. Travelers will rest comfortably on Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds . The complimentary On the House Breakfast offers a variety of hot and cold favorites to start the day. Guests with limited time may opt for an On the Run Breakfast Bag on weekdays. Outstanding amenities at this property include a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness room, business center, and Suite Shop for snacks and sundries. A flight board in the lobby displays real time flight information for Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport. Guests can ride the hotel's complimentary airport shuttle to the terminals.
Lodging specials at this Hartsfield hotel include the Weekend Getaway Package with late checkout. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. HHonors member can earn triple points for Friday-Sunday night stays through December 31, 2015.
about Clark Atlanta University Homecoming, visit www.cau.edu . To book your stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85, call 404-767-9300 or visit www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.com .
About Hampton Inn & Ste Atlanta Airport North I-85
The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport Hotel is just north of Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport and just southwest of downtown Atlanta. The hotel is two and a half miles from the Georgia International Convention Center, four miles from Atlanta Expo Center, and 15 miles from Six Flags Over Georgia. Other nearby attractions include the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola , Underground Atlanta, CNN Center, Georgia Dome and Georgia World Congress Center--all less than 10 miles away from the hotel. The Atlanta Airport hotel also offers a broad range of services and amenities to make its guest's stay exceptional.
 visit: http://www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.COM
